client.java:7470: ')' expected sM("You don't have enough tickets!"; ^ 1 error Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

change sM("You don't have enough tickets!"; to sM("You don't have enough tickets!");

item.title: Adding a ticket shop
item.dc:creator: @OjamaBoy OjamaBoy
item.description:
@OjamaBoy wrote:

Hello, i am currently trying to add a ticket shop, and am having some troubles.
When ever i compile, i get this error:

client.java:7470: ')' expected sM("You don't have enough tickets!"; ^ 1 error Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

Can anyone help me please?
The code at the bottem is the code of the shop.
Any help is appreciated

} else { sM("Not enough tokkul for this item."); } } if (MyShopID == 4) { if (playerItemsN[Slot2] >= TotPrice2) { if (freeSlots() > 0) { deleteItem(1464, GetItemSlot(1464), TotPrice2); addItem(itemID, 1); server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= 1; server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0; if ((fromSlot + 1) > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) { server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0; } } else { sM("Not enough space in your inventory."); break; } } else { sM("Not enough tickets for this item."); } }

Read full topic
